abstract: Less than two weeks ago, General Electric‘s chairman and chief executive Jeffrey Immelt called reports that he was pondering selling off NBC Universal as “more or less made-up drivel.” This week, Bob Wright, the outgoing chairman of that division, is saying something a bit different.
